Spaces We Curate

A glimpse into the bathrooms, bedrooms, foyers, kitchens, and beyond that define Elegant Tiles & Décor.

Sanctuary Bathrooms

Marble-clad oases with bespoke vanities and warm lighting.

Curated Bedrooms

Layered textures and couture built-ins for restful suites.

Statement Foyers

Grand entrances with sculptural lighting and art moments.

Elevated Dining

Tailored for conversation, from bespoke banquettes to wine walls.

Corporate Luxury

Lehigh reception concepts that merge hospitality and brand.

Executive Offices

Boardroom timber, brass, and panoramic glazing for focus.

Outdoor Living

Pools, pergolas, and lounges that glow after dusk.

Sacred Spaces

Prayer rooms with serene palettes and intricate detailing.

Who We Are

Elegant Tiles & Décor Centre Ltd is a leading interior design, construction and landscaping company in Kenya committed to helping clients bring their vision to life.

From concept design to full implementation, we ensure every project is beautifully planned, expertly executed and delivered on time.

We listen – We Create – You Enjoy.

We specialize in full range of home & Office interiors, Imported fully fitted Kitchens, Bathroom Vanity sets, and much more.
